keywords.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain or lose #ylose-memory , if your #yLoseMemory is greater than #b5 , you gain #b2 #ystrength , when your #yLose-Memory tier does not fall below #b10 , you lose #b30% HP next turn.
For each #yAttack card drawn, deals #b3 damage to all enemies. Each turn, killing-intent is reduced by #b1.
For each #yAttack card played, draw #b1 card. At the start of your turn, you lose #b5 HP.
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock.
you take #b30 damage at start of your turn,
Blessing from the star god Eroko, does not die from a single lethal attack damage. Each turn, killing-intent is reduced by #b1.
An eroded creature gains equal to its current #ylose-memory tier at the start of its next turn, Eroded tier decreases by #b1 at the start of each turn,
#yBlock is not removed at the start of your next turn.
For more details, please refer to Snake Flower.
